name: ammonite crochet hook roll
notes:
this crochet hook roll is my nod to the beautiful ammonites and sparkly iron pyrite that grace the shores of the jurassic coast.

if i am honest, i have never even thought about making a hook roll, but once i made this one, i fell in love!  i absolutely love the way it hugs my clover amour hooks (the colourful handles look so lovely set against the dark grey background).

i wanted to find a way to make the 'pockets' horizontally instead of vertically, and i am so pleased with the way it turned out.

the pattern is available as a photo tutorial, with a supporting video tutorial by esther dijkstra from it's all in a nutshell.

i hope you enjoy the pattern.

dedri
